description: Number of normal subgroups of dihedral group with 2n elements.
comments: When n is an odd prime a(n) = 3.
formula: a(n) = d(n) + 2 + (-1)^n. - _Paul Boddington_, Feb 02 2004a(n) = A000005(n) + A176040(n). - _Michel Marcus_, Aug 19 2015
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Jul 04 2001
